album: benfield no travel sprite bubbles and a rice cup of cake
info_en: Small ep from our staff member ps, some experimental dark ambient.
info_pt: Dark ambient experimental pelo nosso membro de staff ps.

info_en: Ambient idm ep from our staff member Inf.
Our Russian friend Lost Bit returns to enough with a 1 long track ep of dark ambient / industrial material.
Esquema are back with a new ep entitled flexdraw. Portuguese electronica.
Dead Wings Flight is a Portuguese electronica project giving us a small ep capturing eno like ambiences.
garlik capsule is a project by previous enough-releasing artist beatoven now in colaboration with his friend iworthshit delivering some more electronic sounds.

Quelnt is a new idm project from the United States. He's wild and unafraid of going to extremes. We loved the attitude on his tracks and decided to help him conjure this album for enough. Keep an eye out for this kid, he'll be back with even better stuff for sure.
Our Russian mafia contacts have forced us to pay attention to one more of their idm prodigies, this time he goes by the artist name of Aljon and delivers very fresh and cheerfull idm.

album: Spectral Duality and Slow Motion Duels
info_en: Despite beeing busy starting up his record label Apegnine Records our canadian friend Vizion still had time to do a little idm ep for us.
Experimental dark ambient album from our staff member ps. Artwork by Helder Costa.
This second enough ep release breaks the dark ambient mood with sweet hopefull idm by one of our founders inf*. he resides in coimbra, portugal and has his online niche at stylevictim.com.
info_pt: EP de IDM suave pelo membro de staff inf*.

info_en: argon is a deer friend of ours, he is located in coimbra and strives hard to provide techno that always drags you into the rhythm. we believe he succeeds.
Laidback electronica ep by skyfusion. an artist from overseas, with his roots deep in the amiga tracking scene, that had his own dj spot on enoughradio back in the days.
Esquema is a project by Portuguese artist beatoven, a one man band dedicated to electronica and idm.
Lost Bit is a Russian dark ambient and experimental musician. Ancient stones crawls slighlty into the ethereal.
this multi-genre compilation became a tribute to both the artists and the listeners involved with enoughradio. The radio has been disbanded but it's spirit lives on.
Electronica from Baltimore, Maryland. By the hands of Jake Mooshian aka Atomchild.
Friendly Robber is a portuguese friend of ours who took some time out from playing the guitar on his band The Vicious Five to do a few solo tracks for us. This small release is mostly electronica.
not satisfied with a new album, our staff member ps also decided to release a small ep.

From Niagara Falls, Canada, Jesse Williams (also known as fast idio), brings us a lush idm track called "he made me eat grass" mixing crunchy beats with a japanese koto driven melody. This track was originally released in September 2002 as a standalone track and then later re-released under our current catalogue numbering. Re-released in 2012 with updated cover artwork by Dina Barbosa.
Dark Ambient / IDM album by Russian project Nightech.
Italian Final Muzik label co-owner and Loud! radioshow dj Deison contacted us about a possible release of his new micro / experimental / eletronic work. It sounded so damn good we couldn't say no.
Dark Ambient album by Russian project Nightech.
Dark laidback idm by our french friend Fabien "ks" Lasserre.
Sinusjog is a belgium one man project. This release is a simple 4 track demo ep exploring experimental idm.

Duncan Avoid is a cooperation project from the founding fathers of a belgium netlabel that we hold close to our hearts called Entity Records. This album is whole about cyberpunk culture, transhumanism, reflection on cybernetic implants and it's consequences to our future society. Artwork by Nicolas Bouvier.
From Uruguai, Ezequiel Rivero delivers us a small idm ep showcasing his talent.
Portuguese artist CKZ presents an album worth of minimalistic but highly emotional idm sounds.

"netlabel artists aren't real artists. netlabel music isn't real music." this is our retork featuring tracks by Mosaik, Aisth, Kilowatts, Sense, Makunouchi Bento, Duncan Avoid, Xhale, Julien Neto, Kschzt, Khonnor, Quobe, Fyzix, Sinespree and Nullsleep. Front cover by Xenusion, back cover by Leili.
From Argentina comes this 4 track electronica idm ep by BTB.
The founding father of the prolific Conv label delivers us a small ep filled with experimental dark ambient from spain.
info_pt: EP de dark ambient experimental pelo projecto Espanhol do curador da editora Conv.

info_en: Our good spanish friend Plagasul finally finished his debut master piece. 4 track ep of acousmatic dark ambient microsound experiments.

More IDM goodness, this time by a new alias of a previously enough artist that goes by the name of Aljon. In case you don't remember, he is Russian, and you might have spotted his new artist name on a recent release at the tonAtom netlabel. His new artist name is ILI and he is back for the release of a 3 track ep of lucious idm sounds that just beg for loop mode. Artwork by Zden.
New dark ambient 3 track ep release at enough. This time by a dear german friend of ours that goes by the name of rngmnn.
More brilliant Portuguese experimental idm ambient, this time by the hands of a good friend of ours: Jerome Faria aka nny.
Portuguese project Aquarelle by Luis Couto delivers an 8 track mini album of what can be considered cinematic ambient post rock.
Fabrice Planquette from France delivered us a 5 track ambient field recordings mash up.

Stepping away from our dark ambiences, a release by Canadian Nicky Apple entitled Buba Calinou. A magical voyage into the mind of a marvelled teddy bear. Uplifting and laidback sounds. Cover graphics by our beloved Antti Jadertpolm.
Dark ambient release by german artist phelios.
Ambient album by guest artist Mystified.
3 track ep of laidback triphop for the masses by Portuguese artist residing in London - GILO.
a dark ambient musicdisk with sounds by ps, rngmnn and gargaj. Interface graphics by xenusion and code by hitchhikr.
Ambient album by American project Mystified.
info_pt: Novo album de ambiental pelo projecto Mystified.

info_en: A guest release by Mutantlab with some easy listening beats and excerpts from the last known audio recordings of The Peoples Temple Cult led by Rev. Jim Jones which commited an act of mass suicide In 1978.
Portuguese artist Combo delivers 4 track ep with some easy listening electronic sounds and beats.
Debut of another suomi on enough, this time with a 4 track ep of mellow IDM to be enjoyed while your head tries to sleep.
Guest release by Bavarian project Macon Tights. 6 tracks of dark industrial ambient idm mashups.
Full length ethnic laidback triphop album by Portuguese talent Virgilio Oliveira.
Guest release of 5 ambient tracks by the Italian flutist Edoardo Romani Capelo.
2 IDM tracks guest release EP by Florida resident Line Noise, known for his work under his netlabel Lacedmilk Tech.
New album by our Russian experimental idm artist friend, also known for his work under his label Dars Records.
3 tracks of deep house argentinian club sounds produced by Lesvicon Soul.
info_pt: 3 temas de deep house da Argentina produzidos por Lesvicon Soul.

info_en: New release by German artist Herwig Holzmann under his alias Macon Tights. 7 tracks of idm ambient sounds with a bit of a dark industrial vibe.
3 track dark ambient ep by our good friend rngmnn. Cover graphics by Nuno Faria.
Undoubtfully the most serious avantgarde and technologically advanced release to come out of enoughrecords, straight from the deep galactic space beatoven delivers some mean laserbeam electro.
Fresh IDM ambient from the German vaults by the hands of Firnwald of Laridae fame.

Film-Noir cinematic ambient release by American artist Infetu: Infiltration in human form. Simulacra, a three track EP revealing the extra-terrestrial encounter (track 1), abduction (track 2), and probe (track 3) through a cinematic soundscape featuring spatters of noise and vocal presence.

Cobra is a one man project made in lisbon, that was born out of the need to create audio support to visual work. It is made of sounds that crawl under, slowly rise and break the skin, it is more a listening experience than music per se.

Though Kevin Krebs often describes himself proverbially, he is a seminal influence in the Netlabel scene and has created many important works using original source material of the eclectic and electroacoustic variety. Mystified, aka Thomas Park, remains a prolific artist who specializes in creating songs and audio collages from sounds he finds at his Saint Louis apartment or from surrounding neighborhoods. "Reclaiming The Darkness" involved a sample exchange-- across the Pacific Ocean, unique and home-crafted sounds travelled as tiny bits, to be retrieved at other shores. Several pieces were written by each artist as "solo" pieces, and one piece, "Blinded", was written by simply agreeing on a track length, and mixing two signals, one from each artist, without preview. The result is a strange and enjoyable journey that emphasizes the strengths of both artists! Kevin Krebs and mystified would like to thank Sandy Spreitz for the fine cover art!
info_pt: Album ambiental colaborativo entre os projectos Kevin Krebs e Mystified. Grafismo por Sandy Spreitz.

info_en: etcetera music is an alternative musical project born in 2005 which tries to find an original way of expression in sound art. Origins of the pig is their newest ep, featuring three recent sonic experiments.

Reknown Lithuanian artist, composer and performer Antanas Jasenka explores many different areas of music from acoustic music, theatre and movie music, to advance experimental, conceptual art, electronic music. Point.exe is a work done with max/msp exploiting the sphere and spectrum of digitally produced sounds, an attempt to take a closer look at the old patterns from today's perspective.
infetu returns with an ep of new material. 4 tracks ep described as a smooth droning wave of ambient noise blended with subtle vocalizations pulsing above and below the surface of comprehension.

Cachexy is a Ukranian noise ambient project doing some nice dark scapes. Original version of Black Fear by Faust. Cover artwork by SunsetArt. Lossless version also available. Reviews: by DarkFloor; by Evening Of Light.
debut of new enough artist from south carolina, with an album of soothing vintage 2002 idm tracks.
4 tracks of experimental noise by our finnish friends grey park.

London raised Pang debuts his first long play, 9 tracks of dark idm sounds recorded, produced and mastered from nov 2005 - may 2006. If you like this release you can also buy a physical copy available at Daddy Tank Records.

this release is the first release under extrapool but phillip spradley has done other releases as "human" on ivdt years back. all his other releases thus far were handmade, extremely limited ones. the name extrapool, and the music made is sort of a reflection on everything that clogs human existance. things commonly associated to "living" that have nothing to do with "surviving". in one sense the work is completely conceptual and another it's satirical. the sound itself is not fixed and ranges from noise and found samples to glitch and breakcore (sort of). influences are mainly first wave industrial, back when the sound was raw and non-conforming (throbbing gristle, whitehouse, einsturzende neubatan, laibach), as well as current more rhythmatic idm artists (richard devine, xanopticon).

You might have heard of soundZcapa by his releases netlabels farfromshowbiz, bennekea and feketepont. His debut on enough is a smooth, sleepy and mostly calm 5 track ep called "merge of two unlike sleeps". Trying to represent the potential metaphysical contact between dreams of two people sleepin' in the same bed. The tracks made by improvisations on keyboard and drummachines on a lazy summer-end week.

we're proud to bring you one of the many projects coming out of [Esc.] Laboratory, [creeper:Robusto] is the name of the project and "cloned superstar" the 10 track album of idm mashed influences. read the infofile of the release for more information on the project.

album: friends reinterpretations of unreleased 332 variations volume 2
info_en: Three tracks by three projects friend with enoughrecords owner ps. volume 2 of a series of others soon to be released on other netlabels scattered through the cyberspace.
A selection of tracks composed by Mystified as soundtrack for a dvd project by australian film director Andrew Merkelbach.
Selection of IDM tracks from 2005 made by Hungarian talent active since 96 that goes by the alias of Nick Otheen.
mp3death.us's k9d brings us a 4 track ep collaborating with some friends showing us a darker side of 8bit sounds, just in time to premiere at his gig in blipfestival 2006.
Dark ambient ep by our good friend and previous enough release artist rngmnn. Cover graphics by Nuno Faria.
EP paying tribute to the demon AMDUSCIAS The Grand Duke Of Hades who gave concerts at the command of men. Courtesy of Tom and Holly Magio under their artist name of Turmoil.
Short album by moldovan artist, dj and journalist megatone. minimal and mystical are the key words to describe it.
Indie electronica EP by UK's rob rob rob, released celebrating his 20th birthday.
A collaboration between previous enough release artist Turmoil and his friend Caleb Jones of Dizzonanz Domestic. Very dark ambient.
info_pt: Album de dark ambient colaborativo entre os projectos Americanos Turmoil e Dizzonanz Domestic.

info_en: New ep by portuguese experimental laptop duo e:4c whom you might recall from their applauded debut at fellow portuguese netlabel testtube. Soothing Experimental glitch ambient idm deluxe extraordinaire.
New album by previous enough release artist Acreil with tracks of a melancholic idm ambient vein, composed 2002-2003.
Album by previous enough release artist Acreil with tracks of a dark  ambient vein, composed 2002-2003.
New album by previous enough release artist Turmoil with tracks of a dark ambient industrial noise vein, using samples recorded from an industrial water treatment plant.
New enough release artist Royce Icon brings us a few dark ambient tracks composed in early 2007 inspired by the "flesh" trilogy of the Findley couple.
info_pt: Royce Icon apresenta um album de temas produzidos em 2007 dentro do dark ambient, inspirado pela trilogia "flesh" dos Findley.

info_en: Pangea is a project from Spanish composer Juan Antonio Nieto, who in the last years has been member of some electronic music bands like Aviador dro, Fracture, Opium and Shakermoon. Now releasing solo some works with harsh sounds, trying to give a floating and hypnotic sense.
[interrupt:jumper] is another of the multiple projects from the previous enoughrecords releasers [Esc.] Laboratory collective. Electro industrial ambient straight out of Germany.
Album from the American noise dark ambient project from Caleb Jones titled dizzonanz domestic.
Anthology of dark ambient themes by the Polish and previous enoughrecords releaser MOAN.
info_pt: Antologia de temas dark ambient do projecto Polaco MOAN.

album: Live at Fonoteca Municipal de Lisboa 26-05-2006
info_en: Bootleg of an electronic music improv jam concert given by aenedra, a band composed by two of the enoughrecords founders plus a few invited friends.
info_pt: Bootleg do concerto de electronica improvisada por Aenedra, banda composta por dois dos membros fundadores da Enough e alguns amigos convidados.

info_en: Short EP by Portuguese project Organic Anagram, a set of dark sound scapes created out of diferent sampled material and a handful of interesting ideas.
Spanish project dj mauri and previously enough releaser of pangea - latimeria juan antonio nieto got together to form this new project unforeseen heights scoping the experimental ambient.
Hungarian release artist Nick Otheen returns with a full length album of IDM.
New dark ambient release from Russian project Fear Konstruktor.
info_pt: Album de dark ambient Russo pelo projecto Fear Konstruktor.

info_en: New Portuguese project Systemic Failure brings us a small conceptual ep of ambient/noise.
Techno / Electro EP from Portuguese project Ezylohm_tek.

Contemporary experimental written and sound artist Roberto Maldoror Manfredini contacted us trying to re-release under our netlabel some of his previously limited edition creations put out through a now defunct local label. This album was one of the first we listened to and imediatly adored, both for it's concept and the sounds derived from it, it's a love tribute to the great Yukio Mishima, even if the title it's kind of... satyrical (the translation could be "Mishima's first rat's fuck", based on the book "Confession of a mask", where he describes his first masturbation on the image of Saint Sebastian).
A compilation of tracks composed by portuguese projects colaborating with each other surrounding the artificial inteligence and post humanism theme. co-organized by nsi-online.
New experimental ambient ep by one of the most famous names of Columbian experimental ambient music David Velez / Lezrod.
Album of space ambient from Siberia, jointly released as a cdr limited edition self-edited by the author, Danil Kazantsev.
Dark Ambient from the Lithuanian shoreline by the hands of Mons Jacet.
info_pt: Album de dark ambient pelo projecto Lituano Mons Jacet.

info_en: Experimental soundscapes from debut Portuguese artist nhoin, a dreamworld renegade designing sounds for imaginary movies. never performing the same song twice.
Gilo returns to enough with his last release under the Gilo artist name, a short ep of his usual laidback downtempo urban lifestyle beats.
Ukrainian artist from Dnipropetrovsk Roman Slavka delivers us a full album of experimental ambient soundscapes.
Harsh electro industrial made in Porto, debut ep by PsychotekTrauma.
Our lithuanian friend Mons Jacet returns with another mini-album, this time with a handful of selected electronic breaks themes he composed a couple years back.
German project by Moritz Herrmann and Christoph Bornheimer. Abstract dark ambient.
Our Hungarian friend soundZcapa returns with more of his ambient post industrial noise, this time mixed with a little classical flavour.
Debut on enough of a young Portuguese producer that goes by the artist name of dmn productions. A short ep of some laidback beats and loops.
Debut release album by canadian gothic rock band The Silence Industry. A project headed by Graham Jackson.
Debut album release by Portuguese electro ambient project Red Dawn.
An electro psychedelic ambient ep with a touch of triphop by British project Wurlitztraction. Composed between January 2005 and July 2006.

New album from Russian project Technology of Silence - ambient / industrial / experimental, existing since 2004. Technology of Silence is a story about City, outlived ecological catastrophe, hypertrophied Chernobyl, is a story about people, which lives in this City, is a story about ecological catastrophe, about human psychosis, human fears and about eternal searching for in loneless. this is their second album, the first (recorded in 2004) having been released in Polish and Russian labels in spring 2007.
2 CD anthology of Mikroben Krieg's evolution through the last 10 years of electro-industrial experiments.
Dark ambient mini album by Swedish Erik Glans, previously releaser at mirakel netlabel.
Portuguese dark ambient side project by enoughrecords previously releaser Edgar aka Nhoin.

New release from our german friends at the [Esc.] Laboratory, this time a follow up album to the dark ages of technology released recently at fellow portuguese netlabel testtube. industrial / ebm. Artwork by their member Harry Seifert.
info_pt: Album de electro industrial EBM de mais um projecto saido do [Esc.] Laboratory na Alemanha, desta feita editado dando continuidade a um outro album editado recentemente: the dark ages of technology pela netlabel Portuguesa testtube. Grafismo por Harry Seifert.

info_en: New release from the Italian previous netlabel releaser Alessandro Brizio, a 4 track ep of electro ambient.
info_pt: EP de electro ambiental pelo projecto do Italiano Alessandro Brizio.

album: Feeding pieces of eggplant sandwich to a flock of not to bright seagulls

info_en: 4 track dark ambient ep from our new Mexican friend victor hugo valdez soto.
info_pt: EP dark ambient pelo projecto Mexicano de Victor Soto, Symbol.

info_en: Solo mini album of experimental ambient by Spanish Carlos Valverde, musician from Raven of Thy Bleak Skies.
Return of our ukrainian friend Roman Slavka with another album of industrial experimental dark ambient.
info_pt: Novo album de industrial dark ambient experimental pelo projecto Ucraniano Roman Slavka.

info_en: experimental electronics split / collaborative work between portuguese acts NNY, e:4c and ps.
Our portuguese friends Structura bring us a recording of their performance at Elektrocution:Ignite festival last summer. Some nice spoken word powernoize sounds.
Courtesy of happy puppy records we bring you an hour of space drones from Canadian Lee Rosevere.

album: The Starlit Numbers On Her Fingers
info_en: Wurlitztraction returns with another album of his psychedelic ambient electronics, this time a little more glitchy but still quite dreamy and pleasant.
Boiar is a Portuguese collective exploring experimental electro acoustic electronics.
A 12 track album by the Polish dark ambient experimental drone project arciv ev noise.
info_pt: Album de dark ambient drone experimental pelo projecto Polaco arciv ev noise.

info_en: A 3 track ep by Portuguese dark ambient / classical project Souls of Nephilims.
A 3 track ep of neo-classic ambient by the experimental Hungarian project soundZcapa.
4 track ep of electronic ambient coming from the North West of England producing something that can be labelled somewhere between the orb and boards of canada, Amitron_7.
Originally released as limited edition of a collection of tracks made in 1998 by mikroben krieg, 10 years later we're proud to bring you it's free online re-release through enough.
Easy listening electronic ambient, this time coming from Lithuanian project Jupiter Makes Me Scream aka Kafka.
Previously released as a limited edition cdr, here is Rob Verrecchia's latest project, short EP of indie electro accoustic music from England.
debut release from German electronics experimentalist Tanja Dovens under her project die minimalistin.
Return from our good friend jari pitkanen, 3 track ep of dark ambient with some lush touches of ethereal.
A re-release from jari pitkanen of his experimental dark ambient vinyl under our friend label planned confusion.

Tribute compilation to Roberto Maldoror Manfredini featuring music from Globoscuro, Vanessa Delirio, Demetrius Grave, Christopher Byler, Ikke, Midori Dropout, A.G. Rosse and soundZcapa. Entirely in the key of experimental ambient electronics.

Swedish blipmusic chiptune superstar Goto80 attacks us with a handful of folk chiptronica gamemusic soundscapes from the icecream age of doom and terror, best played in random mode. The release also includes the original mod files for the Amiga perverts. Plus a musicdisk version for the Playstation Portable with coding courtesy of Titan and graphic animations provided by Raquel Meyers. web browser version and iOS version also available.
Portuguese project Minson who previously released on our netlabel friends MiMi Records, gives us a short ep of experimental dark ambient.

Previously releasing under the recently defunct Kikapu netlabel is the project butterbox, the brainchild of Brazilian producer Frederico Pessoa, here with a 6 track ep of laidback chillout electronica.
info_pt: EP de 6 temas de electronica chillout pelo projecto Brazileiro butterbox.

info_en: Recorded from the improvised jam at the 304 bunker in january 2008 comes this album of glitch, noise, industrial outsurge.
A new release by previous enough releaser royce icon, the american returns with a 3 track dark ambient release.

new release by the label owner of a new portuguese netlabel phonotactics. Our Portuguese friend Edgar releases a 4 track ep with his project Nhoin delivering some ritualistic dark ambient. There is also a video available for download here.

Put together by Dipswitch and with cover graphics by avenger, comes a dubstep compilation featuring producers from canada to finland, from cologne to berlin to poland. DZ, Wadadda ft.FS Dan, Takomo, Desmond Denker, Discreat, Dipswitch himself and a megamix by noneother then 2krazy. You can check the minisite and if you're a demoscener you might recognize the soundtrack from bombman / matt current.

album: Walk Your Soft Skin On The Edges

info_en: Short breakbeat blip music ep by UK's own And. mashing the amen break brotherhood with the pure sounds of the nintendo generation.
Belgium noise from the hands of Velvet Narcosis.
Short 3 track ep by Italian Electro Rock project Divine Holocaust aka Trojan Horse Rotovator.
info_pt: EP de electro rock do projecto Italiano Divine Holocaust aka Trojan Horse Rotovator.

info_en: Ambient album by Morse, an American project from Cedarville, Ohio.
Italian project A3ek delivers us 5 tracks of idm / electronic ambient.
ambient album by the hands of Belgium project BpOlar.
info_pt: Album ambiental espacial pelo projecto Belga BpOlar.

info_en: Experimental Ambient IDM EP by the hands of Berlin resident Hanne Adam under her solo project adamned.age.
Industrial album by Canadian project Pupil, originally self-released in 2003 in a limited edition.
sweet ambient electronica album by the hands of Japanese project kesson shoujo aka watashinokoko, previously released a few other eps at call me bitch cut my wrist netlabel.
Previously self-released in limited edition in 2004, un brings us a full album of techno noise from Canada, sister project of the recently enough releaser Pupil.
Previously self-released in limited edition in 2005, un brings us a full album of techno noise from Canada, sister project of the recently enough releaser Pupil.
6 track idm ep by Russian project Open Work Stocking.
info_pt: EP de IDM noise pelo projecto Russo Open Work Stocking.

info_en: 8 track sampler/anthology of the the works of arcano.zero, a portuguese project wandering the experimental ambient.
2 long tracks of dark ambient by northern portugal project massacre divino.
New EP by previous enough releaser Lithuanian project Jupiter Makes Me Scream. 5 tracks of uplifting laidback electronica.
info_pt: EP de electronica descontraida pelo projecto Lituano Jupiter Makes Me Scream.

info_en: Tamara and Demon album is the soundtrack of the 3D cartoon of the same name, created By Nikolay Aladinskiy and Petr Bobryshev - StPetersburg, Russia. Muhmood - is a one man act and the stage name of Alexei Biryukoff - a Siberian artist, who makes conceptual projects that include large scale figurative paintngs, perfomances, installations and sound. Muhmood's music is a mixture of all kinds of styles, starting from a capellas, going thru experimental dark ambient with an ethnic streak [mostly middle eastern] and creative percussion, ending with heavy guitar riffs and powerful drum sets.
info_pt: Album dark ambient do projecto Russo de Alexei Biryukoff, Muhmood. Banda sonora de um cartoon 3D criado por Nikolay Aladinskiy e Petr Bobryshev.

info_en: New album by previous enough releaser Cachexy. This time with a 5 track dark ambient noise soundtrack exploration including some cover/remix versions from tracks by Olya and Monster and The Litz.
4 track demo from the new Portuguese power industrial project VexXxeR.
Dark ambient album by Portuguese project Vysehrad.
An ambient trance ep by german project HE-LUX, also quite active in the graphic design and vj scene.
Small 4 track ep by Swedish young chip/8bit artist Multifaros. Easy listening 8bit sounds.
New EP by previous enough releaser Megatone. 5 tracks of space / contemplative ambient. Cover art taken from the works of Mihai Tarus with permission.

album: First Whispers: Live at PlanoB, Porto, 20/03/08

info_en: New album by Russian Indie Gothic Triphop band Spinefish, who recently also released on fellow netlabel Ekleipsi.
8 track debut demo album of new Portuguese oldschool ebm project UMM.
18 minute track by the Portuguese drone / noise / dark ambient project AVOIDANT.
3 track ep by Portuguese ambient idm / laidback electronica project Ikimashoo Aoi.

Full length album of isolationism / drone dark ambient by the hands of German project seetyca, with an extensive discography under mbira label and some releases in reknown ambient netlabels such as darkwinter, silence is not empty, treetrunk and otium.
Another release by Portuguese project from Braga called Ikimashoo Aoi, this time showing his indie pop rock side with a 2 track EP.
9 track ep of electro music by Portuguese electronic artist URB.
New EP by previous enoughrecords release artist Ghost Hunter. 4 tracks of laidback indie pop sounds.
7 track demo EP by Portuguese industrial / harsh electronics group Control Alt Deus, who recently got a positive review at side line. This demo EP features 2 tracks recorded live at Metropolis Club.
Debut release of Australian Matt Preston under his indie surf pop electronic project called I vs. Nature.
info_pt: Album de indie surf pop electronica do Australiano Matt Preston com o seu projecto I vs. Nature.

info_en: Harsh Electro EP by Portuguese duo Control Alt Deus, originally distributed at the Lock The Target festival, now also freely available for download.
Debut release of Hungarian project Bashed Nursling, 5 tracks of dark, raw and extremly harsh techno industrial noise.
info_pt: Album de techno noise industrial extremamente agressivo pelo projecto Hungaro Bashed Nursling.

info_en: New release by previous enough artist (morse) with a full album of space ambient. "Soon after the first contact between our home planet and a distant planet, a global secret organization was formed to attempt to keep the public knowledge of these contacts to a minimum. The organization was quickly uncovered following the first attack on our home planet and the organization quickly lost public trust and support. In an attempt to gain the public's trust, the organization allowed one civilian to give reports on the organizations actions. To maintain some secrecy, and protect the reporter's identity, the reports were put out under the name...(morse)"

Previous enough release artist ISK brings us an 8 track ep of another of his projects of harsh electro industrial aktivehate. Closing a chapter before driving the project more into a slightly different style. Features a bonus tribute track to fellow Portuguese hellektro act Control Alt Deus who split up shortly after their two releases at enough.
6 tracks of laidback electronica from London's Project 5am.

Experimental ambient (with field recordings) album by Lisbon resident Jorge Nunes who also recently released at fellow portuguese netlabel XS Records and is more known for his work under the anakedlunch collective.
info_pt: Album de ambiencias experimentais feitas com field recordings pelo Lisboense Jorge Nunes, mais reconhecido pelo seu trabalho com o colectivo anakedlunch.

info_en: To celebrate our 200th non compilation release we bring you this special bootleg recorded by Sir Garbage Truck, of an experimental hardcore ambient jam session form our staff member ps and our Serbian friends from kosmoplovci under their moniker kdes. Big thanks to Nosfe who arranged for us to play in that art gallery somewhere in the middle of Helsinki. Sorry to the person whose sound system we managed to slightly destroy, and thanks to everyone who we met during that week, we have good memories.
EBM album dating back to 2004, from previous mexican enough releaser Victor Valdez.

info_pt: Split de sons doom / drone ambientais entre dois projectos da Argentina: Proyecto de Prueba e Void>Null.

info_en: alterior is an experimental idm project - with some influences of breakcore and videogame music - from New Jersey in the United States. Here with a special version for enoughrecords of his no reason to be ashamed album also available for purchase at cdbaby.

artist: The Vanhalia Project / The Sundog Project
album: The Vanhalia Project / The Sundog Project
info_en: Self-titled electronic ambient split release between two projects: The Vanhalia Project from Italian Giovanni Alibrandi and The Sundog Project from British Ian Johnson. Photograph cover artwork used with permission from Dallas Photoworks.
In a STFU Porto 2009 aftermath, here is a recording of the space ambient set from our local portuguese friend ocp. He has recently also been recently releasing under his own netlabel EdP.

4 track debut release ep of Portuguese darkwave / electronic project In[Perfektion], 5 years after the original demo cdr self-release, we are proud to bring you this remastered high quality version as part of the countdown for their upcoming album "Vultures Among Us", available through Hesperus Records.

album: Realm of the New Day - The Remixes
info_en: Remixes album from Thisco legend Sci Fi Industries. 12 tracks of electronic music remixes and colaborations of Luis Van Seixas with many different projects between 1997 and 2008.

Dark ambient glitch ep by Dyman, delivering here some very different kind of sounds than the triphop laidback beats released at his debut in enoughrecords and his latest album at fellow portuguese netlabel Abutre under his other moniker DMN Productions.

Return of our dark ambient release artist Infetu with a short EP of salvaged tracks originally aimed for a longer album release, which got canceled due to destroyed studio. If you like his work as much as we do, please go to his artist webpage and donate something to help him rebuild his studio.

7 track dark electro / ebm EP originally released back in 2006 by Portuguese darkwave / electronic project In[Perfektion] (featuring a remix by ESC) now remastered and available free for download as part of the countdown to their upcoming album "Vultures Among Us", available through Hesperus Records.

Russian project Open Work Stocking delivers us a new ambient IDM ep. If you like his sounds as much as we do, please also consider getting his latest CD album "Diademia", recently made available at Fluttery Records.
info_pt: EP de IDM ambiental pelo projecto Russo Open Work Stocking, recentemente editou o seu album "Diademia" pela Fluttery Records.

info_en: New album of indie experimental rock, with a touch of psychedelic by Spanish group Sugar Overdose.
info_pt: Album de rock indie experimental pelo grupo Espanhol Sugar Overdose.

info_en: 4 track post-rock ep from Portuguese Renato Martinho under his brainchild project Nagra.

5 track dark electro EP originally released back in 2007 by Portuguese project In[Perfektion] now remastered and available free for download as part of the countdown to their upcoming album "Vultures Among Us", soon available at Hesperus Records.
EP of harsh electro by the hands of Portuguese project aktivehate.
New single EP by Portuguese project Ikimashoo Aoi, ambient IDM.

Sampler Mixtape of Enough Records catalogue, mixed by BrainDance on 21st February 2009, special for Shotmix Podcast, with music selection surrounding the indie laidback electronica. Release page.

Tracklist:
01 Malt.Tabulted Sounds - Chill
02 Acreil - Device
03 Meso - Ualter
04 Phundamental - The Hardly Boys
05 Makunouchi Bento - Sub Sol
06 Quobe - Kqaer

09 Xhale - Film People
10 Jukka-Pekka Flander - 02 220305
11 Khonnor - Blindness Bats

13 CKZ - Mirror Holds
Cinematic dark ambient album by Portuguese project Teatro Grotesco led by Luis Couto (of The Joy of Nature, Aquarelle and Moving Coil).
Laidback drone / celestial ambient by the hands of previous enough releaser Portuguese project Dyman.
Laidback dark beats from Russia. Music by Ostin, artwork by Oleg Bu33a.
info_pt: Batidas lentas e negras pelo projecto Russo Ostin, grafismo for Oleg Bu33a.

album: The Anton Phase Electro Clockwork Menagerie
info_en: Full length psychedelic electro ambient album by the hands of previous Enough Records release artist Amitron_7. Artwork by Joana Dias.
A dark idm laidback / triphop EP by the Russian Anton Chirtsov. Artwork by KillReal.
Dark industrial ambient EP from Russian project Xalm Retribution.
3 track EP of 8bit micromusic love by the hands of French Portuguese project L'homme Manete. Originally released in 2008 by Catita! which is now merging with Enough Records for greater justice.
5 track ambient EP by Portuguese project Newton Balloon. Originally released in 2008 by Catita! which is now merging with Enough Records for greater justice.
4 track 8bit EP by Belgium project Skip. Originally released in 2008 by Catita! which is now merging with Enough Records for greater justice.
7 track EP of 8bit love by the hands of French Portuguese project L'homme Manete. Originally released in 2008 by Catita! which is now merging with Enough Records for greater justice.
Russian ambient laidback idm by Koalips. Cover image by NASA/JPL/University of Arizona.
Lithuanian project Mons Jacet returns with a conceptual album of breakcore punk emotronica extravaganza. Best served in random playlist order.
Dark ambient album by Russian project Xalm Retribution.
5 track EP from US resident Clint Anderson with his idm / breakcore project hapbt. Additional credits to Trifixion for co-producing 1st track and photographing the cover artwork.
Little dubstep experimental EP from US project Sick To The Back Teeth. Also available is the video of Irradiated Dub.
Harsh rhythmic noise from Hungarian project Bashed Nursling. Limited edition CDr copies available for purchase, please contact the project by email to get your copy.
Split IDM EP soundtrack to an imaginary video game by the hands of Israely project Total Reboot and Bypass label owner ZhangJW. Artwork by Wang Jiao and BreakPhreak (Total Reboot).
Downtempo IDM from the Russian project Punktieren.

Japanese Summer Edition remastered version of the UK's psychedelic electronic ambient project Amitron_7 Karma EP, previously released right here at Enough Records back in January 2008, now fully remastered and with 3 bonus tracks. Enjoy the Japanese Summer.
EP of hellektro / harsh electronics by Portuguese project Control Alt Deus. Previously also available as limited edition cdr and paid download through bandcamp, now free for download.
Album of experimental folk electronica by Russian project Open Work Stocking.
Recording of an Experimental Powernoize live act by Structura, performed 22 August 2009 at ThisLac in Lagos, Portugal. Now remastered and properly packaged for release.

Drone compilation of tracks using samples from our well known netaudio ambient artist Mystified. Featured artists in this compilation include Zieltogend, Nata, AON, Luciftias, The Ghost Between The Strings, Morose and Mystified himself.
Electronic ambient from Iran.
Somewhere between shoegaze and celestial noise ambient, we present you a whole album worth of soothing laidback experimental drone scapes by Russian Konstantin Elfimov.
Jerky IDM beats from Portuguese project .crk
IDM debut EP release from project Copy Your Idols by Gary Klatt. All the way from Philadelphia in the USA.
IDM album by German project Firnwald featuring guest participations by Katti Katz, Angela Aux and The Unused Word?
new wave / indie rock album by Portuguese band The Mystery Artist.
New electronic beats album by Portuguese project Dyman.
New electronic beats album by Swiss project Genox.
Darkwave / Neofolk album by Belgium project Art Of Empathy. Co-released also with 7th Crow Records, afmusic, FunerART and Wildness Records.

Celebrating the return home from their european tour to promote their third release, here is the ep from dUASsEMIcOLCHEIASiNVERTIDAS that started it all, now free for download. Some little indie jazz rock to soothe your evenings.
info_pt: Celebrando o regresso a terras lusas de mais uma tour europeia dos dUASsEMIcOLCHEIASiNVERTIDAS aproveitamos para distribuir online gratuitamente o seu primeiro EP.

info_en: 4th album from Russian project Technology of Silence. Cinematic industrial dark ambient of post-nuclear cities.
New album by Hungarian project Bashed Nursling. Harsh ambient noise techno sounds. Includes a special remix by Velvet Narcosis.

Sampler Mixtape of Enough Records catalogue, mixed by ps on 30th December 2010, special for the Discrepant music blog, with music in the vein of dark ambient and psychedelic. Cover artwork photo by adamned.age.

Tracklist:
01) ps - 350_070904
02) ps - rngmnn rmx 001_050421 (pristidae)
03) bitmoth - heads i win
04) ili - flag and sun
05) die minimalisten - memoire mortel
06) ostin - exist
07) amitron_7 - last exit to wythenshawe

Dark ambient album by latvian project macabro with a mixture of soothing soundscapes, combined with warm pulsations of deep bass rhythms. The artist draws influences from both (neo-)classical music and modern electronic glitch-sound material.
info_pt: album de dark ambient do projecto Latviano macabro.

info_en: Short album by Portuguese project Ricardo Webbens with experimental ambient microsound scapes. Artwork by Nuno Rosa.
info_pt: Curto album de sonoridades ambientais pelo projecto Portugues Ricardo Webbens. Grafismo por Nuno Rosa.

info_en: ZX Spectrum medieval quest themes by Spanish project Rolemusic bring the 8bit chiptune vibes back to Enough Records. Artwork by Raquel Meyers, don't forget to buy her DVD if you like her stuff.

album: within the electrick soul of an architectural intelligence
info_en: Industrial ambient in a laidback mood with shades of glitch and noise. Originally produced in 2006, now released through Enough Records, an album by another of the many pseudonyms of the German [Esc.]Laboratory.
Russian project Nasienie brings us a drone ambient album of very introspective sounds, bridging urban isolation and the exploring of nature.
Laidback electronica full length album by Belgian project Daizy.
info_pt: Album de electronica pelo projecto Belga Daizy.

info_en: Electronic ambient album by Iranian project Spuntic.
Dark ambient with drone and sludge metal influences by Portuguese project AVOIDANT.

Electro rock single EP by Canadian project The Easton Ellises, featuring a tech house remix by Nomis Yor. The Easton Ellises is a new project embracing copyleft culture by the same members of the recently dismissed Stereomovers, a duo active in the club and rave scene for over a decade.

Double album release by Varia, mashing sampled quotes with electro, hiphop, disco, rock and 80s hits into regurgitated electro disco idm or ambient tracks with it's own online TV channel. Brainchild project of Juho "Blamstrain" Hietala and Jari "1in10" Pitkanen. Two demosceners from Finland active under TPOLM and MFX. Their sound having already been used in demos such as Agenda Circling Forth / CNCD & Fairlight.
Electronic ambient album with female vocals by French project Litmus. Originally released in January 2010 in a limited edition of 200 copies, now free for download at Enough Records.
Psychedelic jazz rock album by Portuguese project dUASsEMIcOLCHEIASiNVERTIDAs. Originally available as limited edition tape at A Giant Fern, now free for download.
Electronic rock debut EP of The Easton Ellises, new Canadian project derived from the Stereomovers.
info_pt: EP de estreia dos The Easton Ellises, um novo projecto Canadiano derivado dos Stereomovers, com sonoridade electro rock.

info_en: Dark Electro EP of b-sides from our terror ebm project aktivehate.
Electro / IDM / breakcore EP by Portuguese project .crk. Cover photo by Maria Popova.
Laidback dark beats album by Russian project Ostin. Cover artwork by makemassair.

album: United Consumer Fuckers / Prepare For Revolution
info_en: Social political activist mashup album from an unknown artist. First release of our new sub-label Anonymous Archives. Please check the associated minisite.
Minimal ambient by Iranian project Spuntic.

5 track EP of portuguese guitar sounds blended with electronics, produced almost entirely with an iPod and free tools from the apple app store, by the portuguese project M-PeX. Physical edition of this EP is also available for purchase at FNAC stores in Portugal, or by direct order from the author by email. Following the hiatus since the highly acclaimed debut release of "Phado", this EP serves as build-up to a new album to be released in the coming months, we hope you enjoy this release, and if you like it as much as we do please remember to support the artist. Artwork by Marco Madruga. Photograph by Marco Ramos.
Latest album by UK project amitron_7. Laidback psychedelic ambient with a touch of jazz and plenty of vintage sampling.

Double album of classic piano style jazz compositions by Jared C. Balogh flowing between different states of introspection, anxiety and acceptance. 2 volumes of Balogh's "Seasons" series. "Chaotic-Life-Fin" is a compilation of 9 songs from volume 1 of the "Seasons" series. It is a piano based album that has a contemporary jazz and classical feel. It presents a strong emotion of passions in finding true love, finding your place in the world, lifting yourself up through tough times, releasing internal problems free to being healing, and personal resolutions. "Revitalized Eyes" has spurts of jazz like moments but is mainly a compilation of the more avant garde, contemporary and experimental classical style songs written in volume 1 of the series "Seasons". It is a 10 song album that takes the listener on an invigorating journey of great emotions.
New single from Canadian e-rock project The Easton Ellises. Additional remix by D. Xela & Nomas Yor. Producer remix pack also available for download.
Industrial sci-fi dark ambient album by Polish project Pulsipher with some breakcore moments.

album: Small Trips In The City Of The Old Man
info_en: Acoustic bedroom studio psychedelic experience album by Portuguese project Fried Moura.
Double album of experimental laidback electronic ambient exploring different genres and moods from Lithuanian project Mons Jacet.
Dubstep 4 track plate EP by Trollhead, a collaborative project between David Deschuyteneer (aka Ronny Ragtroll) and Jan Robbe (aka Atomhead).
Rhythmic noise EP by French project Edgeist.

Lolicore album by US project No Loli-Gagging. Mixing influences from hardcore, breakcore, speedcore, gabber, trance, drum n bass, techno, house, noise and even ambient. All with the usual heavy dosage of high pitched lolita vocals and abrupt track endings.
Laidback electronic ambient album by Polish project Distant 294.

First release of a series of mixtapes raising awareness to the Anonymous, #antisec, Wikileaks and Occupy Wall Street movements. Organized in colaboration with xDA hackerspace, this release is part of Enough Records social and political activist sub-label Anonymous Archives and has it's own minipage.

03) No Loli-Gagging - Occupy The Internet
04) amitron_7 - Zuccotti Park
05) Virgilio Oliveira feat. a poem by divinity33372 - Opression
06) macabro - We Live Lies
07) unknown artist - dreams
08) YTCracker - #antisec
09) Copy Your Idols - What If (Ron's Revolution Mix)

Second release of a series of mixtapes raising awareness to the Anonymous, #antisec, Wikileaks and Occupy Wall Street movements. Organized in colaboration with xDA hackerspace, this release is part of Enough Records social and political activist sub-label Anonymous Archives and has it's own minipage. Mixed by Amitron_7. Cover by Roland Henry.
Tracklist:

02) Jari Pitkanen - 111220 Vuvukat
03) Amitron_7 - Zuccotti Park

07) Jared Balogh - The Calm before the Storm (reprise)
08) YTCracker - #antisec
09) No Loli-Gagging - Occupy the Internet
10) M-PeX - Navimort
11) Macabro - We Live Lies

New mashup album by one member of Varia, you might remember them from their previous release at Enough Records, a double album titled Magic + Omega. It's quite hard to define their style in writing, a remix / mashup sonic soup of sorts using 70s and 80s classics in post new wave / disco / electro fashion mixed with some occasional movie or audiobook sampling.

Third release of a series of mixtapes raising awareness to the Anonymous, #antisec, Wikileaks and Occupy Wall Street movements. Organized in colaboration with xDA hackerspace, this release is part of Enough Records social and political activist sub-label Anonymous Archives and has it's own minipage. Mixed by Ricardo Webbens.

Fourth release of a series of mixtapes raising awareness to the Anonymous, #antisec, Wikileaks and Occupy Wall Street movements. This fourth release also focuses on SOPA / PIPA, ACTA and #PL118. Organized in colaboration with xDA hackerspace, this release is part of Enough Records social and political activist sub-label Anonymous Archives and has it's own minipage. Mixed by ps. Cover by Roland Henry.

Tracklist:
01) Frank Boyant - Starving to Death (ps's Portuguese Anonymous Remix)
02) Copy Your Idols - Art Is Dead (Ifland & Klatt's Final Nail Edit)
03) Dainon - ACTA
04) TheJuiceMedia: RAP NEWS 4 - Wikileaks vs The Pentagon - WWWAR on the Internet
05) unknown artist - Occupy

After three years from their latest artistic effort, "Riccardo III" is the new album of the italian experimental music project Globoscuro with actress Ilaria Fierro, a tortured, tragicomic adaptation of the famous Shakespeare's play with spoken voices in Italian.

Split compilation of what can be described as shoegaze, post new wave or experimental indie pop. Tracks by Kacey Explosion, Politesse, Deadbeat Synesthete, Blablarism and White. Curated and compiled by Jari Pitkanen. Artwork photography by Meire Todao.
Debut electro industrial album release by Czech project Beta Dog.

Ambient electronica / dub techno debut album by Brazilian duo ANFS, following up to their self-released EP mx01. A battle space of 55 minutes between analog and modular tones, modulated noises and field recordings.
info_pt: Album de estreia de electronica ambiental / dub techno do duo Brasileiro ANFS.

info_en: Latvian industrial / rhythmic noise project Hezzel delivers us this full length album free for download. If you like this work please buy his other album Purge, a physical CD also recently released through Strum.

microsound / drone / experimental ambient album by Portuguese project Jerome Faria aka NNY. If you enjoy this release and wish to support the artist the deluxe edition is available for purchase at bandcamp.
Uplifting 7 track EP by Ukranian indie pop project Gosprom. Following up their releases on fellow netlabels Headphonica and Clinical Archives.

Electronic anthology by Russian Dmitriy Krotevich also known as Punktieren. This album contains several previously unreleased tracks of different musical influences with a strong Jazz background, all of which were produced by Dmitriy dating back as far as 2001, in this release this tracks are mixed together seemlessly into a megamix anthology of his older works. Cover artwork by Elena Romenkova.
Second EP release by Canadian project The Easton Ellises.
info_pt: Segundo EP do projecto Canadiano The Easton Ellises.

info_en: Experimental electronics EP by our staff member ps, exploring dark ambient, glitch, field recordings, noise and industrial sounds to awaken the world to a new tomorrow.
Laidback electro EP by anonymous Swedish project Inom. Cover artwork by Victor Martins.

album: Loving Foolishness with a Degree of Hope

info_en: Cinematic dark ambient album by Gutterhulk. A side project from Enough Records previous release artist Pulsipher. Great Stewardship is the soundtrack to an imaginary videogame inspired by other games such as Heart of Darkness, Starcraft and Thief. Co-released by Treetrunk Records and Nakrikal Records.
Ambient drone sounds from Iran.
Breakcore EP by Portuguese project .crk.
Indie space rock alternative album by Portuguese project Dyman.

Mashup by an unknown artist, using samples from old movies and music albums to compose a concept album about the possibility of an upcoming american civil war. Promoting global critical thinking independent media sites such as infowars.com. Part of our Anonymous Archives sub-label.
Laidback electronic ambient album by Polish project Distant 294.

Mixtape of Enough Records catalogue put together by ps in 2009, appears to have remained unreleased until august 2012. Tracks range from chillout indie pop to dark electro industrial sounds.
Tracklist:
01) Frame - Fiction (00:00)
02) Ikimashoo Aoi - We Love You a Thousand (04:03)
03) Jenifer Avila - Aixi On Som (10:04)
04) Rob Rob Rob - Persistent Clouds (15:06)
05) Nhoin - Submenu Hack (18:40)
06) Pang - Senova (21:42)
07) Technology of Silence - Velo-city (25:30)
08) Violet and The Mutants - Hard Lullaby (30:47)
09) Control Alt Deus - Shut You In The Dark! (34:07)
10) Vexxxer - Penetrate (39:36)
11) Extrapool - Cathartitron Revisited (43:10)
12) Jukka-Pekka Flander - 110305 (47:11)
13) Waste Disposal Machine - All The Good Ones Die Young (50:32)
Darkwave full length album by Portuguese project Inperfektion.

"Dance it, Dance all" is the 10th Easton Ellises creative commons single.

To mark the occasion, the band launched a successful 30 day fan funding (a.k.a. crowd funding) campaign in order to collect the funds necessary to press a vinyl record.

A producer pack was put up on the web for artists to remix and submit their own versions of the song. The response was phenomenal and "Dance it, Dance all" remixes were submitted from all over the world. Due to the limited amount of play time available on a vinyl record, only the original version, a Motel Costes Mix and the bands 6 favourite remixes were pressed onto the record and officially released in Montreal, Canada on May 17th 2012.

Included in this "Dance it, Dance all" release are the 12 cuts that the band really wanted to press on the record.

Mixing electronics with the sounds of the Portuguese guitar might seem odd at first but Portuguese project M-PeX has been mastering it for a couple of years with great public acclaim. His latest release is in the shape of an EP titled Ignis, and brings us 5 tracks with a scent of dubstep surrounding the theme of the ancient theory of the platonic solids. The physical release is also available at Portuguese FNAC stores or can be ordered directly from the author by email.

4 is the 4th album from the Portuguese psychedelic jazz rock noise project dUAS sEMIcOLCHEIAS iNVERTIDAS (dSCi). Titled after the self-titled 4th albums of other notorious bands, this album is now made available free for download to celebrating the end of their kebab tour 2012 while the band is still making their way back to Portugal crossing through Spain, France and Italy.

Live bootleg of Finnish project Nega live at the Latvian Noise festival Kuucvaals in 2011. Performing a set bridging from experimental ambient to powernoize and spoken word. The quality of the recording is a bit dodgy but good enough to feel the experience if you play it on a proper sound system. A couple links on youtube [1] [2]
Followup album of laidback electronica sounds by our Belgium project Daizy.

Mixtape of original IDM tracks by Portuguese project likeicare, showcasing some of his work through the last production year. Most of tracks having already been released through other netlabels, here they are mixed down in 20 minutes of likeicare.

album: 100 Years of Noise - Public Domain Celebration Release

info_en: Album by Portuguese project M-PeX in collaboration with Makrox. Mixing Portuguese guitar with electronics, jazz and hiphop elements. World music at it's best. Artwork by Marco Madruga.

Follow up compilation of experimental electronic tracks from artists out of Portugal and the North America. The theme of the compilation is crossing the Atlantic ocean. Organized and co-released by Thisco Records. Features tracks by Mantrakid, ocp, Oxford Icebergs, Human Being, Sci Fi Industries, Infetu, ps, Dyman, Com. Gen., shhh..., Waste Disposal Machine, Undara, Mystified and AVOIDANT. Artwork by American painter Ariel Claborn.

Split of minimalistic dronescapes by Emerge and Sustained Development, being the members of both projects the guys behind the Attenuation Circuit label. Both tracks in this EP are based on guitar sounds by Jesus Jackson.

NoiseTrade Special Enough Records sampler featuring tracks from Daizy, M-Pex & Makrox, 1in10/Varia, Dmitriy Krotevich, dUASsEMICcOLCHEIASiNVERTIDAS, Dyman, The Easton Ellises with Violet & The Mutants, Gosprom and Jenifer Avila.
info_pt: NoiseTrade Special Enough Records sampler com temas de Daizy, M-Pex & Makrox, 1in10/Varia, Dmitriy Krotevich, dUASsEMICcOLCHEIASiNVERTIDAS, Dyman, The Easton Ellises, Violet & The Mutants, Gosprom e Jenifer Avila.

info_en: Experimental electronic jazz double album by the hands of Janne Nummela, poet and painter. The title references to The Kalevala, the Finnish work of epic poetry.

Concept album by an unknown artist, remixing rock classics and mashing them up with samples on the topic of mind control, power over masses and independent thinking. Part of our Anonymous Archives sub-label.

Debut release of Portuguese industrial electronics project Agnosept by Chris Fussion (Vladimir Pavlov) who is recently collaborating with folks from other reknown projects in the Portuguese electro industrial scene such as Aktivehate, Inperfektion and ESC.
Portuguese industrial post-cyberpunk project kokori delivers us here an EP compiling a set of instrumental geek shaman electronic burlesque sounds with some sampling of local political activism.
Electronic album by the hands of German project Th.e n.d. Cover photograph by Mati Faane.
A prequel to Anima Ombra, Siam Soul blends lost sounds from 70s and 80s into an uplifting mashup album, reminiscent of positive memories from our glory teenage summer days.
Electronic album by Spanish project Chuzausen. Artwork by Anna Katarina.

Centuries ago a pirate ship sank in the Pacific Ocean. Three days after the shipwreck the only confirmed survivor was found recently married to a local dancer in the Caribbean Islands. Composed by rolemusic using LSDJ and rendered in bgb emulator. Artwork by Love Through Cannibalism.
